title: {x:Static NumericConstant} way of accessing constants in XAML page
body: The "{x:Static NumericConstant}" way of accessing code page constants in XAML page already exists in WPF. This approach will provide an elegant way of accessing constants both in code and XAML pages in Silverlight, and for my immediate need in Windows Phone 7. For instance,

comments.body: I don't know why this functionality was taken out of WPF, but it needs to be put back in. It was far too useful and IMHO should never have been removed.
